name: selected
title: :selected Selector
desc: Selects all elements that are selected.

examples.desc: Attaches a change event to the select that gets the text for each selected option and writes them in the div.  It then triggers the event for the initial text draw.

entries.longdesc: The :selected selector works for <option> elements. It does not work for checkboxes or radio inputs; use :checked for them.
